website_summaries.verdict: While this kit contains all the essential materials of a quality spill kit, it stands out for its portability, making it a good option for users who often have to travel to locations where spills are a possibility.
pros: This kit includes 2 socks, 10 pads, and 1 disposal bag
While this is smaller than some bucket kits, it adds to the portable nature of this kit, which is where it shines
The lightweight cloth container is easier to carry than bucket models, especially when carried by the attached handles, and it is compact enough to fit easily into the trunk of any car
Its bright yellow stands out in the dark, making it easy to locate in an emergency situation
cons: 2 socks is not enough to contain a large spill, making this kit useful only for lighter jobs
